text: Nhung neu kham pha ra viec hai nguoi lam chung đo pham toi (khai man) thi hai nguoi khac chon trong so ba con gan nhat co quyen đoi hoi viec huong gia tai cua nguoi chet, đung ra the cho cua hai nguoi pham toi tren, va yeu cau ho the nhan danh Allah, nhu sau: “Chung toi xac nhan loi khai cua chung toi that hon loi khai cua hai nguoi truoc va chung toi khong vi pham su that boi vi trong truong hop đo chung toi se la nhung ke lam đieu sai quay.”
